glsa.title: Puppet Agent: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Puppet Agent, the worst of which could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Puppet Agent contains Puppetâ€™s main code and all of the dependencies needed to run it, including Facter, Hiera, and bundled versions of Ruby and OpenSSL.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Puppet Agent. Please review the references for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or obtain sensitive information.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
